titleStmt.title: A word to Londons provinciall assembly. Or, a view of some passages in the ministers late vindication of their government. To which is added a vindication of the Covenant against all intruders and opposers. / By Nehemia Cent:.
titleStmt.author: Cent, Nehemiah.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Author, and are to be sold at the Crowne in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
